Articles.Content:
I don't know if I missed anything but.

All the KSOS vehicle wheels clip into the floor when I attach them, causing the vehicle to be immobile..

Stock wheels work perfectly though.

Phase V?

Cheers, flamerboy67664/SpaceEagle

Not that I wouldnt love to see that... but there is the CactEye Telescope which is amazing and fits (although just barely) into the EWBCL cargobay.

Did everyone's hang really long the first time loading? Mine is stuck currently at KSP/rpm/ksp_sstmfd/mfd40x15002 for quite a long time. I know patience is key with ATM first time loads but this is a little much.

Did everyone's hang really long the first time loading? Mine is stuck currently at KSP/rpm/ksp_sstmfd/mfd40x15002 for quite a long time. I know patience is key with ATM first time loads but this is a little much.

Yes, long load times and even freezes are not unheard of.

However, the items that ATM has processed prior to the freeze do not have to be repeated. Those are now cached. So if it looks like it hangs then just restart. Each time it will have less work to do and will be less likely to freeze.

Yes, long load times and even freezes are not unheard of.

However, the items that ATM has processed prior to the freeze do not have to be repeated. Those are now cached. So if it looks like it hangs then just restart. Each time it will have less work to do and will be less likely to freeze.

I know how ATM works I just wanted to make sure it was normal for this particular mod.

I install 1 & 3 packs together, i found a bug, with texture in some shuttle parts, they white.

If i install a full pack, or only one of packs, with textures all right.

How can i install both 1 & 3 packs together?

I install 1 & 3 packs together, i found a bug, with texture in some shuttle parts, they white.

If i install a full pack, or only one of packs, with textures all right.

How can i install both 1 & 3 packs together?

Which parts are white?

I install 1 & 3 packs together, i found a bug, with texture in some shuttle parts, they white.

If i install a full pack, or only one of packs, with textures all right.

How can i install both 1 & 3 packs together?

KSP has a problem with tga files, and KSOS is full of tgas. To be fair, the new mk3 parts also use tga format, and will have the same problem. One solution would be to convert the files to png format, which can be done with any number of graphics converters. Another would be to use the mbm format, but i think you'd need Unity and the PartTools to do that.

KSP has a problem with tga files, and KSOS is full of tgas. To be fair, the new mk3 parts also use tga format, and will have the same problem. One solution would be to convert the files to png format, which can be done with any number of graphics converters. Another would be to use the mbm format, but i think you'd need Unity and the PartTools to do that.

While this is true, I have no problems with the tgas included with the KSOS, or even the new Mk 3 parts. From all Ive seen white parts as a result of tga issues are usually resolved by reloading the game. However Wuwuk's issues sounds as if there is a missing texture in on of the packs.
This...is...AWESOME!!!

This...is...AWESOME!!!

Glad youre enjoying it.

Which parts are white?

Parts of Resolute shuttle is white,

parts become white after installation of pack 3 over pack 1.

- - - Updated - - -

pack 1 or pack 3 separate,

textures a ok.

In this weekend i will try to convert KSOS tgas to png.

And see what changes.

Parts of Resolute shuttle is white,

parts become white after installation of pack 3 over pack 1.

That still does not help. Which parts, specifically?

That still does not help. Which parts, specifically?

All parts of shuttle:

Cockpit, cargo bay, engine mount, wings etc.

As I come home from work I will write more precisely.

After several restarts KSP,

textures of the shuttle parts was all right.

But I found another bug.

It is present at installation of the full pack.

Here's a screenshot.

textures of the shuttle parts was all right.

But I found another bug.

It is present at installation of the full pack.

Here's a screenshot.

On the second screenshot, i see the shuttle part on the left and strange circle on the right,

Its a bug?

Nope. Thats what the part appears as until you attach it to the rear of the KSO... its for stack mounting the shuttle to a rocket like this:
@Mods_o_joy Yes they do. Pack 4 I think.

Does this mod come with the vehicles in the pic(The stairs, Refueling car thing)

Yes, those vehicles comprise Phase IV (pack 4) of the KSOS.

Nope. Thats what the part appears as until you attach it to the rear of the KSO... its for stack mounting the shuttle to a rocket

Thanks,

I did not know about it.

I convert KSOS pack 1 textures in png,

and restart KSP many times,

but part "KSO Centerline Mounting Shroud" is allways white.

Sad.

I have been having this problem for days now. My solution was to just delete the specific folder and it all loads up fine. Every thing looks good except for certain IVAs that definitely don't look right. Obviously I know that is result of the missing files. However they just dont load. I have waited for hours to get them to load and I highly doubt its just ATM taking a long time to convert the files. I am talking 2 hours everyday for the last 4 days. I just leave it and let it load. KSP isn't frozen. The scrolls on the loading screen still go by. It seems that no one else is having this problem so it might be a conflict with the mods I have. So the mods are in a picture below, I am running on a mac, and here is my log.
This mod takes up a ton of memory, by far the heaviest mod in my roster. Is there a way to maybe release a low res version that uses less RAM?

This mod takes up a ton of memory, by far the heaviest mod in my roster. Is there a way to maybe release a low res version that uses less RAM?

Install ATM.
